Title: Vampire in Brooklyn
Writer: Eddie Murphy (story), Vernon Lynch (story), Charlie Murphy (story), Charlie Murphy (screenplay), Michael Lucker (screenplay), Chris Parker (screenplay)
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Angela Bassett, Allen Payne, Kadeem Hardison
Plot: A ship sails into Brooklyn with all its crew dead. But something gets off and the killing continues on land. The vampire is looking for a specific woman - half-human, half-vampire. Rita's the cop detective investigating the many killings.
